arts.ttl: Real Madrid pay tribute to Diogo Jota ahead of Champions League tie with Liverpool
arts.sum: Ahead of their clash with Liverpool on Tuesday night, a delegation from Real Madrid attended Diogo Jota’s memorial to pay tribute to the deceased forward and his brother, Andre. The pair tragically passed away in June during a car accident in Zamora, in the North-West of Spain. The delegation consisted of former teammate Trent Alexander-Arnold, […] The post Real Madrid pay tribute to Diogo Jota ahead of Champions League tie with Liverpool appeared first on Football España.

arts.ttl: "It's just a matter of time" – Xabi Alonso backs Wirtz to succeed at Liverpool
arts.sum: Xabi Alonso is confident that Florian Wirtz will silence his doubters at Liverpool.

arts.ttl: Trent Alexander-Arnold sums up Liverpool feelings in one word before Real Madrid clash
arts.sum: Trent Alexander-Arnold could face Liverpool for the first time since his summer move to Real Madrid and the full-back has sent a message ahead of his Anfield return.

arts.ttl: “Always nice” – Liverpool midfielder’s father asked about Real Madrid links
arts.sum: Liverpool host Real Madrid in the Champions League at Anfield later today. Ahead of this clash, Tuesday’s edition of AS has published an interview with Liverpool star Alexis Mac Allister’s father, Carlos. Over the years, the Liverpool player has been linked to Real Madrid but there weren’t any concrete developments. arts.ttl: Liverpool vs Real Madrid – Predicted lineup and team news
arts.sum: Liverpool host Real Madrid on Tuesday for a crucial Champions League showdown, desperately needing to build on their weekend victory. A 2-0 win over Aston Villa finally ended a dreadful four-game losing streak in the Premier League. Now, the Reds must carry that momentum onto the European stage. arts.sum: Liverpool and Real Madrid lock horns at Anfield on Tuesday in one of the standout fixtures of the Champions League group phase. arts.ttl: Trent Alexander-Arnold's new life at Real Madrid as he makes Anfield return: His inner circle in Spain, the Liverpool team-mates who haven't stayed in touch and how he keeps himself busy off the pitch
arts.sum: On Tuesday night, Anfield will host 22 of the greatest footballers from all corners of God's green earth. But before this showpiece, the attention is on a lad from just round the corner.

arts.ttl: Transcript: Xabi Alonso’s Pre-Match Press Conference Ahead of Real Madrid vs Liverpool in the UCL
arts.sum: Real Madrid head coach Xabi Alonso will face one of his old teams, which he represented as a player, as Real Madrid take on Liverpool in Matchday 4 of the Champions League. Alonso spoke to the media ahead of the game against Liverpool at Anfield.
